title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
descr: Apply a mixture of cement, sand, pigment, or marble chips to floors, stairways, and cabinet fixtures to fashion durable and decorative surfaces.
alt_titles: Artificial Marble Worker, Build Master, Buildmaster, Coat Agent, Concrete Journeyman, Finisher, Granite-Chip Terrazzo Finisher, Grinder, Installer, Marble-Chip Terrazzo Worker, Onyx-Chip Terrazzo Worker, Roller, Roofing Laborer, Rustic Terrazzo Setter, Template Worker, Terrazzo Finisher, Terrazzo Grinder, Terrazzo Installer, Terrazzo Journeyman, Terrazzo Laborer, Terrazzo Layer, Terrazzo Mechanic, Terrazzo Polisher, Terrazzo Roller, Terrazzo Setter, Terrazzo Tile Setter, Terrazzo Worker
experience: Some previous work-related skill, knowledge, or experience is usually needed. For example, a teller would benefit from experience working directly with the public.
education: These occupations usually require a high school diploma.
job_training: Employees in these occupations need anywhere from a few months to one year of working with experienced employees. A recognized apprenticeship program may be associated with these occupations.
example: These occupations often involve using your knowledge and skills to help others. Examples include orderlies, counter and rental clerks, customer service representatives, security guards, upholsterers, tellers, and dental laboratory technicians.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Measure designated amounts of ingredients for terrazzo or grout, according to standard formulas and specifications, using graduated containers and scales, and load ingredients into portable mixer.
work_tasks.descr: Measure designated amounts of ingredients for terrazzo or grout, according to standard formulas and specifications, using graduated containers and scales, and load ingredients into portable mixer.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Grind surfaces with a power grinder, or polish surfaces with polishing or surfacing machines.
work_tasks.descr: Grind surfaces with a power grinder, or polish surfaces with polishing or surfacing machines.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Spread, level, or smooth concrete or terrazzo mixtures to form bases or finished surfaces, using rakes, shovels, hand or power trowels, hand or power screeds, or floats.
work_tasks.descr: Spread, level, or smooth concrete or terrazzo mixtures to form bases or finished surfaces, using rakes, shovels, hand or power trowels, hand or power screeds, or floats.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Grind curved surfaces or areas inaccessible to surfacing machine, such as stairways or cabinet tops, with portable hand grinder.
work_tasks.descr: Grind curved surfaces or areas inaccessible to surfacing machine, such as stairways or cabinet tops, with portable hand grinder.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Cut metal division strips and press them into the terrazzo base for joints or changes of color to form designs or patterns or to help prevent cracks.
work_tasks.descr: Cut metal division strips and press them into the terrazzo base for joints or changes of color to form designs or patterns or to help prevent cracks.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Blend marble chip mixtures, place into panels, and push a roller over the surface to embed the chips.
work_tasks.descr: Blend marble chip mixtures, place into panels, and push a roller over the surface to embed the chips.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Modify mixing, grouting, grinding, or cleaning procedures, according to type of installation or material used.
work_tasks.descr: Modify mixing, grouting, grinding, or cleaning procedures, according to type of installation or material used.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Wash polished terrazzo surface, using cleaner and water, and apply sealer and curing agent according to manufacturer's specifications, using brush or sprayer.
work_tasks.descr: Wash polished terrazzo surface, using cleaner and water, and apply sealer and curing agent according to manufacturer's specifications, using brush or sprayer.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Position and secure moisture membrane and wire mesh in preparation for pouring base materials for terrazzo installation.
work_tasks.descr: Position and secure moisture membrane and wire mesh in preparation for pouring base materials for terrazzo installation.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Fill slight grinding depressions with matching grout material and hand-trowel for a smooth, uniform surface.
work_tasks.descr: Fill slight grinding depressions with matching grout material and hand-trowel for a smooth, uniform surface.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Sprinkle colored marble or stone chips, powdered steel, or coloring powder over surface to produce prescribed finish.
work_tasks.descr: Sprinkle colored marble or stone chips, powdered steel, or coloring powder over surface to produce prescribed finish.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Wet surface to prepare for bonding, fill holes and cracks with grout or slurry, and smooth with a trowel.
work_tasks.descr: Wet surface to prepare for bonding, fill holes and cracks with grout or slurry, and smooth with a trowel.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Clean installation site, mixing and storage areas, tools, machines, and equipment, and store materials and equipment.
work_tasks.descr: Clean installation site, mixing and storage areas, tools, machines, and equipment, and store materials and equipment.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Wet concrete surface and rub with stone to smooth surface and obtain specified finish.
work_tasks.descr: Wet concrete surface and rub with stone to smooth surface and obtain specified finish.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Chip, scrape, or grind high spots, ridges, or rough projections to finish concrete, using pneumatic chisel, hand chisel, or other hand tools.
work_tasks.descr: Chip, scrape, or grind high spots, ridges, or rough projections to finish concrete, using pneumatic chisel, hand chisel, or other hand tools.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Mold expansion joints and edges, using edging tools, jointers, or straightedges.
work_tasks.descr: Mold expansion joints and edges, using edging tools, jointers, or straightedges.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Move terrazzo installation materials, tools, machines, or work devices to work areas, manually or using wheelbarrow.
work_tasks.descr: Move terrazzo installation materials, tools, machines, or work devices to work areas, manually or using wheelbarrow.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Mix cement, sand, and water to produce concrete, grout, or slurry, using hoe, trowel, tamper, scraper, or concrete-mixing machine.
work_tasks.descr: Mix cement, sand, and water to produce concrete, grout, or slurry, using hoe, trowel, tamper, scraper, or concrete-mixing machine.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Clean chipped area, using wire brush, and feel and observe surface to determine if it is rough or uneven.
work_tasks.descr: Clean chipped area, using wire brush, and feel and observe surface to determine if it is rough or uneven.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Repair concrete by cutting out damaged areas, drilling holes for reinforcing rods, and positioning reinforcing rods, using power saw and drill.
work_tasks.descr: Repair concrete by cutting out damaged areas, drilling holes for reinforcing rods, and positioning reinforcing rods, using power saw and drill.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Precast terrazzo blocks in wooden forms.
work_tasks.descr: Precast terrazzo blocks in wooden forms.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Remove frames when the foundation is dry.
work_tasks.descr: Remove frames when the foundation is dry.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Signal truck driver to position truck to facilitate pouring concrete and move chute to direct concrete on forms.
work_tasks.descr: Signal truck driver to position truck to facilitate pouring concrete and move chute to direct concrete on forms.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Build wooden molds, clamping molds around areas to be repaired, or setting up frames to the proper depth and alignment.
work_tasks.descr: Build wooden molds, clamping molds around areas to be repaired, or setting up frames to the proper depth and alignment.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Spread roofing paper on surface of foundation and spread concrete onto roofing paper with trowel to form terrazzo base.
work_tasks.descr: Spread roofing paper on surface of foundation and spread concrete onto roofing paper with trowel to form terrazzo base.

work_tasks.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_tasks.task: Produce rough concrete surface, using broom.
work_tasks.descr: Produce rough concrete surface, using broom.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.descr: Keeping up-to-date technically and applying new knowledge to your job.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.descr: Establishing long-range objectives and specifying the strategies and actions to achieve them.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.descr: Scheduling events, programs, and activities, as well as the work of others.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.descr: Developing specific goals and plans to prioritize, organize, and accomplish your work.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.descr: Performing physical activities that require considerable use of your arms and legs and moving your whole body, such as climbing, lifting, balancing, walking, stooping, and handling of materials.
work_behaviors.lvl_2_label: Performing Physical and Manual Work Activities

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.descr: Using hands and arms in handling, installing, positioning, and moving materials, and manipulating things.
work_behaviors.lvl_2_label: Performing Physical and Manual Work Activities

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.descr: Using either control mechanisms or direct physical activity to operate machines or processes (not including computers or vehicles).
work_behaviors.lvl_2_label: Performing Physical and Manual Work Activities

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.element_name: Operating Vehicles, Mechanized Devices, or Equipment
work_behaviors.descr: Running, maneuvering, navigating, or driving vehicles or mechanized equipment, such as forklifts, passenger vehicles, aircraft, or water craft.
work_behaviors.lvl_2_label: Performing Physical and Manual Work Activities

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.descr: Using computers and computer systems (including hardware and software) to program, write software, set up functions, enter data, or process information.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.element_name: Drafting, Laying Out, and Specifying Technical Devices, Parts, and Equipment
work_behaviors.descr: Providing documentation, detailed instructions, drawings, or specifications to tell others about how devices, parts, equipment, or structures are to be fabricated, constructed, assembled, modified, maintained, or used.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.descr: Servicing, repairing, adjusting, and testing machines, devices, moving parts, and equipment that operate primarily on the basis of mechanical (not electronic) principles.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.descr: Servicing, repairing, calibrating, regulating, fine-tuning, or testing machines, devices, and equipment that operate primarily on the basis of electrical or electronic (not mechanical) principles.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.descr: Entering, transcribing, recording, storing, or maintaining information in written or electronic/magnetic form.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.element_name: Interpreting the Meaning of Information for Others
work_behaviors.descr: Translating or explaining what information means and how it can be used.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.element_name: Communicating with Supervisors, Peers, or Subordinates
work_behaviors.descr: Providing information to supervisors, co-workers, and subordinates by telephone, in written form, e-mail, or in person.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.element_name: Communicating with People Outside the Organization
work_behaviors.descr: Communicating with people outside the organization, representing the organization to customers, the public, government, and other external sources. This information can be exchanged in person, in writing, or by telephone or e-mail.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.descr: Developing constructive and cooperative working relationships with others, and maintaining them over time.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.descr: Providing personal assistance, medical attention, emotional support, or other personal care to others such as coworkers, customers, or patients.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.descr: Convincing others to buy merchandise/goods or to otherwise change their minds or actions.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.element_name: Resolving Conflicts and Negotiating with Others
work_behaviors.descr: Handling complaints, settling disputes, and resolving grievances and conflicts, or otherwise negotiating with others.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.element_name: Performing for or Working Directly with the Public
work_behaviors.descr: Performing for people or dealing directly with the public. This includes serving customers in restaurants and stores, and receiving clients or guests.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.element_name: Coordinating the Work and Activities of Others
work_behaviors.descr: Getting members of a group to work together to accomplish tasks.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.descr: Encouraging and building mutual trust, respect, and cooperation among team members.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.descr: Identifying the educational needs of others, developing formal educational or training programs or classes, and teaching or instructing others.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.descr: Providing guidance and direction to subordinates, including setting performance standards and monitoring performance.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.descr: Identifying the developmental needs of others and coaching, mentoring, or otherwise helping others to improve their knowledge or skills.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.element_name: Providing Consultation and Advice to Others
work_behaviors.descr: Providing guidance and expert advice to management or other groups on technical, systems-, or process-related topics.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.descr: Performing day-to-day administrative tasks such as maintaining information files and processing paperwork.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.descr: Recruiting, interviewing, selecting, hiring, and promoting employees in an organization.

work_behaviors.title: Terrazzo Workers and Finishers
work_behaviors.descr: Monitoring and controlling resources and overseeing the spending of money.
